section.p: The back room of the temple is shrouded in gloom. A golden wheel is set into the far wall. You may spin this wheel once at a cost of . for the outcome.

outcomes.outcome:
Lose 1 point from any ability
(minimum score of 1)

Gain 1 point on any attribute
(maximum score of 12)
Displeasure of the goddesses (lose all blessings)

Favour of the goddesses (write the title
on your Adventure Sheet)

section.p: You may not take any ability (COMBAT, CHARISMA, etc) below 1. If your Stamina drops below 1 you are killed. Once you have spun the wheel, .
